int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d
" , & t ) ; while ( t > 0 ) { int n ; scanf ( "%d
" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] , i , c , s = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; c = min ( a [ 0 ] , a [ 1 ] ) ; s = s + c ; for ( i = 2 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { c = min ( c , a [ i ] ) ; s = s + c ; } printf ( "%d
" , s ) ; t -- ; } return 0 ; } int min ( int q , int r ) { int m ; if ( q > r ) m = r ; if ( r > q ) m = q ; if ( q == r ) m = q ; return m ; }

int min ( int q , int r ) { int m ; if ( q > r ) m = r ; if ( r > q ) m = q ; if ( q == r ) m = q ; return m ; }
